name: Operation KREEP (itch)
description:
In space no one can hear you KREEP...

Operation KREEP is a two-dimensional top-down couch co-op (offline) multiplayer action game. An extraterrestrial organism threatens deep space exploration missions! Only trained personnel working as a team can eliminate these infestations. But, the corporation financing the space endeavor has a private mail for you:
Cold hard cash for the alien alive!

Which side will you choose?

Features:
  • Engage in a frantic local multiplayer action game (offline 1-4)
  • Play single player matches against AI agents
  • Fight in a dozen of arenas and pick from multiple player skins
  • Try out various game rule mutators to take part in hilarious matches
  • Decide, with or against your friends?!
  • Both keyboard and controller support
Controller support:

The game supports up to four XInput devices (e.g.: the Xbox 360 controller).

If your controller(s) does not happen to be in this category check:
http://www.x360ce.com
The controller emulator is easy to set up and works perfectly with Kreep!

1.1 Free update:

From the 2nd of June 2016 the 1.1 free update for Operation KREEP is available containing:

  • New maps and refined old ones.
  • New mutators.
  • Achievements.
  • Various fine tunings, fixes and many more!
1.2 Free update:

From the 6th of December 2016 the 1.2 free update for Operation KREEP is available containing:

  • 3 new maps, totaling 20 arenas now.
  • Difficulty fine tuning and enhancements for the "Sudden Death" mechanic.
  • User interface streamlining to allow easier match restart or reconfiguration.
  • Input (keyboard & controller) handling refinements and fixes.
  • New "evil CEO" endings :).
